name: Mineralölwirtschaftsverband e. V.
goal: Participate in the discussion for a reliable, sustainable and and affordable energy supply. Present the public and stakeholders with the contributions the MWV member companies can provide for achieving this goal.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Renewable Enery Directive and others, EU Emission Trading System and others, see homepage
